lines.speaker: Wife
text: I knew that no matter what, you would keep fighting for me.
Whether you succeeded or failed... won or lost... didn't matter to me.
Because I knew that you would always try as hard as you could.

lines.speaker: Hero
text: Of course I would try as hard as I could. I love... I loved you.

lines.speaker: Wife
text: I know. That's what love IS.
It's okay to love yourself, too.
